metadata.title: CVE-2024-38313 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In certain scenarios a malicious website could attempt to display a fakelocation URL bar which could mislead users as to the actual website addressThis vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS < 127.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
